Skins:
Ayotte, Gretch, Gretch signature, Ludwig, Ludwig Acrolite, Ludwig Supraphonic, Ludwig Vintage, Ludwig & Ludwig, Pearl Free Floating System, Pearl Signature, Yamaha 9000, Yamaha Birch Custom.
Metals:
Meinl Custom Heavy, Paiste 602, Zildjian (New beat, A series, K Series, and Constantinople Series)

All Kits can be cofigured with or w/out the close, overhead, and room mics.

Various combinations of kits , players, and effects are included.

If your computer has issues with playing some kits, load them in the MX configuration. This uses the least resources, but gives a bit less control.
